x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Check for broken reference records in the scheduled maintenance tables. ie. scheduled execution missing SMI.
Customers reporting work orders are missing the Procedure Task button. In the past when this happens we change the asset tag, save, then change asset tag back, save and then the Procedure Task becomes visible. This is not working.
SMI were missing the Checklist when the WO's were created from them.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: SMI broken reference record probe
